<script>
(function() {
  var correct = "test123"; 
  var maxTries = 1;
  var lockMinutes = 10;
  var now = Date.now();

  var failData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("news_fail")) || {count:0, lockedUntil:0};

  if (now < failData.lockedUntil) {
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
      document.body.innerHTML = "<h2 style='text-align:center;margin-top:20%;color:#c00;font-family:sans-serif;'>⛔ Access Denied ⛔<br>This page is currently under development and testing<br>Please try again later.</h2>";
    });
  } else {
    failData.count = 0;
    localStorage.setItem("news_fail", JSON.stringify(failData));

    var ok = false;
    for (var i = 0; i < maxTries; i++) {
      var input = prompt("🔒 This page is under testing. Please enter password ("+(maxTries - i)+" attempts left):");
      if (input === correct) { ok = true; break; }
      else { failData.count++; }
    }

    if (!ok) {
      failData.lockedUntil = now + lockMinutes * 60 * 1000;
      localStorage.setItem("news_fail", JSON.stringify(failData));
      document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
        document.body.innerHTML = "<h2 style='text-align:center;margin-top:20%;color:#c00;font-family:sans-serif;'>⛔ Access Denied ⛔<br>This page is currently under development and testing<br>Please try again in "+lockMinutes+" minutes.</h2>";
      });
    }
  }
})();
</script>

<style>
/* ===== News page-only minimal styles ===== */
.news-wrap{max-width:980px;margin:0 auto;padding:0 12px;}
.news-intro{margin:22px auto 8px;font-size:1.05rem;line-height:1.8;color:#333;font-family:system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;}
.news-badge{display:inline-block;font-size:.78rem;padding:.2em .6em;border-radius:999px;background:#f5f9ff;border:1px solid #d8e2f1;color:#0b3d91;}

/* ===== Timeline (合并后的最终版本：线更明显、圆点对齐且不被覆盖) ===== */
.news-tl{ --datew:120px; --line:#cbd5e1; --dot:#0d6efd; }

.news-tl-year{
  font-weight:800; font-size:1.2rem; color:#2c3e50; margin:28px 0 10px;
}

.news-tl-list{
  display:grid;
  grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 28px 1fr; /* 中列更宽以容纳更粗竖线 */
  row-gap:16px;
  position:relative;
}

.news-tl-list::before{
  content:"";
  grid-column:2; grid-row:1 / -1;
  width:3px; /* 更粗 */
  background:linear-gradient(
    180deg,
    rgba(13,110,253,.18) 0%,
    rgba(13,110,253,.28) 20%,
    rgba(13,110,253,.28) 80%,
    rgba(13,110,253,.18) 100%
  );
  justify-self:center;
  border-radius:2px;
  box-shadow:0 0 0 1px rgba(13,110,253,.08);
}

.news-tl-item{ display:contents; }

.news-tl-date{
  grid-column:1;
  align-self:start;
  justify-self:end;
  text-align:right;
  padding-right:12px;
  font-weight:700;
  color:var(--dot);
  font-size:.95rem;
}

.news-tl-dot{
  grid-column:2;
  width:14px; height:14px;
  border-radius:50%;
  border:3px solid var(--dot);
  background:#fff;
  justify-self:center;
  align-self:start;      /* 顶部对齐 */
  margin-top:.6rem;      /* 与卡片标题行对齐；可微调 .5~.7rem */
  box-shadow:0 0 0 3px rgba(13,110,253,.12);
  transform:translateZ(0);
}

.news-tl-card{ grid-column:3; }

@media (max-width:740px){
  .news-tl{ --datew:98px; }
  .news-tl-list{ grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 26px 1fr; }
}
@media (max-width:480px){
  .news-tl{ --datew:86px; }
  .news-tl-date{ font-size:.9rem; }
  .news-tl-list{ grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 24px 1fr; }
}
</style>
